articles.title: Smartphone exports rise 83% despite chip crunch - Times of India
articles.description: India Business News: The country’s total smartphone exports are set to be upwards of Rs 42,000 crore ($5. 6 billion) in the justending fiscal, a growth of nearly 83% again
